sentences.sentence: Finally, don’t miss Puukohola Heiau. This sacred spot was built in 1790 by King Kamehameha as an offering to the gods, where he asked for success in his campaign to unite the Hawaiian Islands.
sentences.translation: 最后，不要错过Puukohola Heiau，这个神圣的地方是由卡美哈美哈国王于1790年建立，作为对神的供奉，以祈求成功统一夏威夷群岛。
